result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Antonio C Green

records.addlTxt: At the request of the Court, the 11/15/22 status conference is rescheduled to 11/17/22 at 9:30.  Parties notified.  rmm

Defendant Antonio C Green not in court, in custody.  Attorney Andrew Joel Golden appeared by video for Antonio C Green.  
Prosecuting attorney Katrina Voge appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. 
Deputy Court Clerk: rmm. 
OFF THE RECORD.  hearing held via Zoom.  Status conference held.  Defendant has a felony in Br. 41.  Court authorizes transfer of this matter to Br. 41 for resolution only.Case is adjourned to Br. 1.  This case will be heard via Zoom. Zoom meeting information provided to parties.
Status conference scheduled for November 15, 2022 at 09:30 am.

Defendant Antonio C Green appeared by video.  
Attorney Eric Bashirian appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. 
Deputy Court Clerk: rmm. 
OFF THE RECORD.  Hearing held via Zoom.  Matter set for status of counsel.  The SPD office has not appointed counsel yet and requests another date.
Status conference scheduled for September 23, 2022 at 10:30 am.

Defendant Antonio C Green not in court, defendant in custody.  Eric Bashirian appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Hearing held via zoom. HEARING HELD OFF THE RECORD. Defendant is eligible for a public defender. No attorney has been appointed yet. Court adjourns case in Branch 01.  This case will be heard via Zoom. Zoom meeting information provided to parties.  Status conference scheduled for August 23, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 3.  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Antonio C Green in court with attorney Julita Kishma de Leon.  Defendant Antonio C Green in custody.  Nate K. Mcclure appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Antonio C Green appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Davila, Branch 1. Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant pled not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION. This hearing may be streamed live at the Court's discretion on https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/83289ee0-2326-3076-b9a3-4c551cf64527  Pre-trial conference scheduled for July 26, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE ARREST WARRANT.

Defendant Antonio C Green not in court.  Jessica Bellows appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered an Arrest Warrant to be issued. Upon arrest, defendant is ordered remanded to a commissioner. Court ordered any bail on deposit to be forfeited. Court makes a finding that there is a possible victim identified and stays the forfeiture order with restitution to be determined at close of case.
Summons mailed.  Defendant ordered into room 221 Safety Building on 05/11/2022@2:00pm
